org.opendaylight.controller.sal.authorization

Interface IResourceAuthorization

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IContainerAuthorization
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Application, Authorization, ContainerManager

    public interface IResourceAuthorization
    Interface for applications which maintain an authorization database for their resources. Respective application web bundle and User Manager make use of this interface to retrieve authorization information at user or and role level.

        Returns:

      • getApplicationRoleLevel

        AppRoleLevel getApplicationRoleLevel(java.lang.String roleName)
        Returns the application role level for the specified role. If the role is not known to this application NOUSER will be returned as specified in AppRoleLevel
        Parameters:
        roleName - the role name to query
        Returns:
        the application level of the given role in the application context as specified by AppRoleLevel. If the role is not part of this application's roles, NOUSER is returned.

      • isApplicationRole

        boolean isApplicationRole(java.lang.String roleName)
        Returns whether the specified role is part of this application's roles
        Parameters:
        roleName - the role name to test
        Returns:
        true if the role belongs to this application, false otherwise

        Create a resource group for application. NOTE: Resource addition is "best effort", if an object is not of correct type, it is discarded.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name for the resource group
        resources - the list of resources for the group
        Returns:
        the status of the request

      • assignResourceGroupToRole

                               java.lang.String role)

        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the resource group
        role - the role name

      • isApplicationUser

        boolean isApplicationUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Return whether the specified user has access to this application. In other words if the user is associated any roles belonging to this application.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        true if the user has access to this application's resources, false otherwise
